title: Lovely Hotel in a Great location - Review
text: My sister and I spent a few days in Paris during the Holidays. This hotel is beautiful and the rooms are very nice. Our room was small but had a great view of the street and shops. Paris is spectacular at Christmastime and we were able to enjoy all of the sites and a lot of shopping. This hotel is located very within walking distance of Galeries Lafayette - great shopping -- and has a very nice breakfast buffet and an executive lounge with snacks and drinks.
